plot: The boys are having another epic race from England to Verbier, Switzerland as Richard and James traveled to Verbier on a plane against Jeremy in a Ferrari 612 Scaglietti. In the news segment, the boys share their ideas for Christmas presents. Richard and James are having a race in Norway to see whether a Mitsubishi Lancer Evolution Rally car is faster than a bobsleigh. The boys investigates whether showroom cars of today are faster than race cars from the past. Can a Renault F1 car lap around the Top Gear test track under a minute.—Caboose

Jeremy drives a Ferrari 612 Scaglietti against Richard and James in a plane to see who can get from the Top Gear studio to Verbier, Switzerland the fastest. In Lillehammer, Norway, there's another race to see who can get down a mountain the fastest - James in a Mitsubishi Lancer Evo driven by Henning Solberg, or Richard and a professional bobsleigh team. The 2004 Top Gear Awards are announced. Eddie Izzard is the Star In A Resonably Priced Car.—Allister Coots
